author: Louise Hall, Louise Hall
title: Coronavirus: Teenager who allegedly bragged about spreading virus in Snapchat video wanted by police
description: Police say they will be charging the 18-year-old with making a terroristic threat
content:
An 18-year-old who allegedly boasted on Snapchat about having coronavirus and spreading it to the general public is being searched for by local police.
Authorities accused Texas teenager Lorraine Maradiaga of claiming in a social media video to be Covid-19 p… [+1913 chars]
